name: Flow Catchments
description: Identify the catchments within a set of flow paths

inputs.name: Flow Paths
inputs.description: The flow paths as generated by the flows component

inputs.name: Proximity Threshold
inputs.description: The distance between end points required to form a catchment

outputs.name: Flow Paths
outputs.description: The flow paths grouped by catchment

outputs.name: Color Codes
outputs.description: Colour codes the uniquely identify each path and boundary
